function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on global supply chains for healthcare products and appliances","Impact":"Disruption of trade in materials and components for renewable energy and batteries","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply sources and development of local manufacturing capabilities","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring and local manufacturing technologies","People":"Governments, corporations, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Governments, corporations, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of critical energy industries to supply chain disruptions","Impact":"Decreased reliability of global supply chains and potential delays in energy production","Mitigation":"Re-shoring and securing supply of essential minerals","Technologies":"Advanced supply chain management and materials sourcing technologies","People":"Energy industry stakeholders and policymakers","Owner":"Governments, energy companies, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Reduction in energy investment due to the pandemic","Impact":"Threat to the long-term prospects for new energy production and potential delays in energy transition","Mitigation":"Support for struggling energy companies, implementation of decarbonization conditions, and monitoring of recovery programs","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, investment monitoring tools","People":"Energy companies, policymakers, and investors","Owner":"Governments, energy companies, and financial institutions"}]}
